at0000.1.description: وثيقة لتوصيل المعلومات للآخرين, عادة كاستجابة لطلب من طرف آخر.
*Document to communicate information to others, commonly in response to a request from another party.(en)
Document to communicate information to others, commonly in response to a request from another party.
Documento para comunicar información a otros, comunmente en respuesta a la solicitud de un tercero.
Documento para comunicar informações a outros, comumente em resposta a uma solicitação de terceiros.
Dokument som brukes for å kommunisere informasjon til andre, ofte som svar på en forespørsel.
Ein Dokument zur Übermittlung von Informationen an andere, meist als Antwort auf eine Anfrage.
일반적으로 다른 상대의 요청에 대한 응답으로, 다른 사람들과 정보를 통신하는 문서.
Asiakirja tiedon välittämiseksi muille, vastauksena yleensä toisen osapuolen pyyntöön.
Documento per comunicare informazioni ad altri, comunemente in risposta ad una richiesta di un altro soggetto.
Document om informatie met anderen te communiceren, vaak op verzoek van een andere partij.
Dokument för att förmedla information till andra, vanligen som svar på en begäran från en annan part.
用于交流信息的文件，通常是为了响应某一方的请求

includedExternalTerminologyCodes.value: Requires reasonable adjustment for health and care access (Equality Act 2010)
Vision - for example blindness or partial sight
Hearing - for example deafness or partial hearing
Mobility - for example walking short distances or climbing stairs
Dexterity - for example lifting and carrying objects, using a keyboard
Social or behavioural - for example associated with autism spectrum disorder (ASD) which includes Asperger’s, or attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (ADHD)
Uses telecommunications device for the deaf
Requires support for expressive communication needs
Preferred method of communication: British Sign Language
Requires support for receptive communication needs
Uses personal audio recording device to record information
Visual frame sign language interpreter needed
Requires speech and language therapist support to communicate
Requires contact by short message service text message
Requires third party to read out written information
Requires written information in at least 24 point sans serif font
Requires information on audio cassette tape
Requires written information in at least 28 point sans serif font
Requires healthcare information recording on personal audio recording device
Requires information in electronic downloadable format
Requires information on digital versatile disc
Requires information in electronic audio format
Requires information on universal serial bus mass storage device
Requires written information in at least 20 point sans serif font
Difficulty processing information at normal speed
Requires carer to be present at encounters
Uses apps on mobile device to support communication
Care to be delivered in consultation with the patients carers
Has appointed person with personal welfare lasting power of attorney (Mental Capacity Act 2005)
Needs assistance with medication regimen adherence
Requires additional staff resource for their mental impairment
Requires additional staff resource for their physical impairment
Requires additional staff resource for their sensory impairment
Has anxiety related to clinical settings
Patient requires minimal waiting time between arrival and being seen
Requires familiarisation with environment of care
Self care deficit for medication management
Requires single room during inpatient care

en.purpose: To record additional composition metadata aligned with IHE-XDS which is not already available from the Reference Model COMPOSITION class.
en.use: Use to add IHE-XDS aligned metadata to a COMPOSITION.context, which along with existing COMPOSITION attributes, allows the composition to be registered in an IHE-XDS environment.

includedExternalTerminologyCodes.value: Reasonable adjustments for health and care access

en.purpose: To record details of the subject's wishes and consent with respect to sharing their care record, particularly their GP record with external parties.
